With solar industry in crisis, Europe in a bind over Chinese importsEurope's green energy transition is stuck between a rock and a hard place. A flood of cheap Chinese solar panel imports is driving record solar energy installations. But those same imports are crushing Europe's few local solar manufacturers. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 12:41:43 GMT O3FJY4AJRBMVVBHCOIZR5WUWPU https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/with-solar-industry-crisis-europe-bind-over-chinese-imports-2024-02-06/Kate Abnett, Nina Chestney可持续发展气候与能源
Exclusive: Russia's Novatek sets up China office to market gas amid sanctions- sourcesRussian natural gas producer Novatek is building a new China-based team to explore marketing the fuel, sources familiar with the plans said, as U.S. sanctions thwart plans for exports from its new multi-billion dollar Arctic project. Volkswagen's Audi reduces output at Brussels plantVolkswagen's luxury car brand Audi has reduced output at its Brussels plant for at least two weeks and is examining options for what models the plant should produce in the medium-term, a spokesperson said on Tuesday.
